message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I believe it's a great deal, given its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but $150 is a bit steep for me.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $120. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $120 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $100. This is my final offer.
